tidbits.title: Pristine Beaches
tidbits.description: The islands are renowned for their stunning white sandy beaches and crystal-clear turquoise waters, attracting tourists for beach holidays and water activities.

tidbits.title: Coral Reefs and Diving
tidbits.description: Turks and Caicos boast some of the world's best coral reefs, offering exceptional diving and snorkeling opportunities to explore diverse marine life and underwater landscapes.

tidbits.title: British Overseas Territory
tidbits.description: As a British Overseas Territory, the islands have a blend of British and Caribbean influences, seen in their culture, traditions, and cuisine.
